author: Source: Sun Journal
title: Gilmore Girls Revival: Here's Everything We Know - Sun Journal
text:
We've gotten over our excitement about Netflix's upcoming Gilmore Girls revival enough to start asking the important questions. How many episodes will there be? Netflix is eyeing four 90-minute episodes, described as "mini-movies," for the limited run.
 Sun Journal.
